name: Ball run and rush
description:
Ball run and rush is a platform game. Become a ball and pass through all levels by picking up all items on your way. The more you advance, more the difficulty increase.

To finish a level, you'll need to pick up all items, you will be able to collect keys and, also some hearts to recover your life.

The game is divided into 4 zones each containing 5 levels + a bonus level.

The game is optimized Xbox controller and PS4 controller.
